# Homework 12

I will be using ggplot and other packages to explore the iris dataset. 
```{r}

df<-iris

graph1<-ggpairs(df, aes(col=Species, alpha=0.8), progress = FALSE)
graph2<- ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Sepal.Width))+facet_wrap(~Species)+geom_point()


graph1 
graph2
  

```
